Title: Jigarthanda
Writer: Karthik Subbaraj (story), Karthik Subbaraj, Karthik Subbaraj
Actors: Siddharth, Bobby Simha, Lakshmi Menon, Nassar
Plot: An aspiring director targets a ruthless gangster because he wants to make a violent gangster film. His discreet attempts to research the gangster fail miserably. Finally when he gets caught snooping, things hit the fan.
